alert.note: Alert for Guam (Guam) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued October 14 at 9:57PM ChST until October 14 at 11:00PM ChST by NWS Guam
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM CHST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Northern Guam. * WHEN...Until 1100 PM ChST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. Overflowing poor drainage areas. Ponding of water in urban or other areas is occurring or is imminent. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 955 PM ChST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Flash Flood Warning continues for central and southern Guam until 1100 PM CHST. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Dededo, Tamuning, Yigo, Mangilao, Barrigada and Andersen AFB. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
